attributes.action: Price cap Heating Oil in the same way as exists for domestic Gas and Electricity
attributes.additional_details: Heating Oil prices are subject to the same pressures as Gas and Electricity and should be considered equally. This is of particular interest to those in rural areas who are facing significant challenges this winter.
attributes.background: Provide price capping on Heating Oil in the same way as exists for domestic Gas and Electricity. Consider Heating Oil within the bounds of any support package to feeeze price caps.
